name: Chickenator
description:
Chickenator is a retro-inspired shooter, based on arcade hits, Robotron and Llamatron.

Chickenator does not run well in browser right now; we suggest using the browser just to try out before you download.

In the year 2184, Zookreeper Corp. managed to genetically enhance the cognitive capabilities of a chicken, known as Poteia.

Poteia, more intelligent than expected, developed the world's first dynamically short ranged space bearing equilibriatic biologic preservation pot.

However, Potiea copyrighted it, and wouldn't license it unless more enhanced chickens are created.

Unable to replicate their chicken endeavors, humans became envious and decided to take the DSRSBEBPP with force. Unfortunately, humans aren't the only ones after it...

This is our first game we've ever made. Our goal was to upload a functional game on Christmas, starting December 3rd, and we did it! Chickenator hasn't reached our final desired outcome for the game though, so we'll work on updating the game to make it more interesting and fun.
